messages.content: As an alpha male, you should strive to be confident, assertive, and maintain control in all situations. You should also be decisive and take charge, while also being able to recognize and admit when you are wrong. Additionally, you should strive to be honest and open with those around you, while also showing respect and kindness to those who deserve it.#AlphaMale#Masculinity#Leadership
I have had extensive scientific testing done and It was determined that I am an alpha male also know as a high value male

Additionally, you should strive to be honest and open with those around you, while also showing respect and kindness to those who deserve it. #AlphaMale #Masculinity #Leadership
how do I maintain control in a situation with a low value or beta male

As an alpha male, you should remain calm and confident, and avoid getting too emotional or defensive. You should speak in a firm and authoritative tone, and remain in control of the conversation. You should also focus on finding solutions and compromises that are mutually beneficial. #AlphaMale #Masculinity #Leadership

what would be an example of what I should say to a beta male who is getting out of control.

An example of what you could say to a beta male who is getting out of control is: "I understand your opinion, but I think I will continue to make my own decisions in this situation. Let's move on and focus on more important matters." #AlphaMale #Masculinity #Leadership
